tiers.plus: Custom AI models, dedicated data scientist

questions.question: Is this HIPAA compliant?
questions.answer: Yes, all data is de-identified and aggregated. We never use actual patient data, only consumer behavior patterns.

questions.question: How accurate is the data?
questions.answer: Our data is 95% accurate and updated weekly. We verify through multiple sources and remove any questionable records.

questions.question: Can I exclude my existing patients?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Upload your patient list and we'll exclude them from all targeting to focus on new acquisition.

questions.question: How quickly can I launch campaigns?
questions.answer: Pre-built audiences are ready instantly. Custom audiences take about 24 hours to process and verify.

questions.question: Do you provide lookalike audiences?
questions.answer: Yes! We can build lookalikes from your best patients and sync them to Facebook and Google.
